Election Information
====================

### **GENERAL ELECTION 2026** [Notice of Deadline to file an application for place on the ballot](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20251208051511.pdf?t=202512081845550)

**Upcoming Election Information** ***Información Electoral Proximo*** **Election Day - May 2, 2026** ***Día de elección 2, de mayo, 2026*** The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2026, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. *El Concejo Municipal de la Ciudad de Colorado está compuesto por un Alcalde, elegido en general, y seis (6) cargos del Concejo, elegidos de seis distritos uninominales geográficamente definidos, cada uno sirve por períodos de dos (2) años y son elegidos por los votos calificados de la Ciudad.  En 2026, los escaños del Concejo para el Distrito 3, el Distrito 4 y el Distrito 6 estarán en la boleta electoral*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### **[2026 INTERNET POSTING REQUIREMENT](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Internet%20Posting%202026.pdf?t=202512081850310)** **\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*** **Unofficial Results of 5-3-2025 Election** ***Resultados No Oficiales de 5-3-2025 Eleccion***

**Upcoming Election Information** ***Información Electoral Proximo*** **Election Day - May 2, 2026** ***Día de elección 2, de mayo, 2026*** The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2025, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. *El Concejo Municipal de la Ciudad de Colorado está compuesto por un Alcalde, elegido en general, y seis (6) cargos del Concejo, elegidos de seis distritos uninominales geográficamente definidos, cada uno sirve por períodos de dos (2) años y son elegidos por los votos calificados de la Ciudad.  En 2025, los escaños del Concejo para el Distrito 3, el Distrito 4 y el Distrito 6 estarán en la boleta electoral*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**[2025-26 Internet Posting Requirements](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/elections/Internet%20Requirements%202026.pdf?t=202508151427390)** **Past Elections Information** ***Información Electoral Pasado*** **Election Day: May 3, 2025** ***Día de elección: 3 de mayo, 2025***
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2025, the Council seats for Mayor , District 1, District 2, and District 5 will be on the ballot. *El Concejo Municipal de la Ciudad de Colorado está compuesto por un Alcalde, elegido en general, y seis (6) cargos del Concejo, elegidos de seis distritos uninominales geográficamente definidos, cada uno sirve por períodos de dos (2) años y son elegidos por los votos calificados de la Ciudad.  En 2025, los escaños del Concejo para Alcalde, Distrito 1, Distrito 2 y Distrito 5 estarán en la boleta electoral.* **[Application for Place on the General Primary Ballot SOLICITUD DE INSCRIPCIÓN PARA UN LUGAR EN LA BOLETA DE LA ELECCIÓN PRIMARIA GENERAL](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/forms/pol-sub/2-4f.pdf)**

### **[Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot - 2025](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20for%20Deadline%20for%20Place%20on%20the%20Ballot%20%20%20%202025.pdf?t=202412051741060)** **[Aviso De Fecha Limite Para Presentar Una Solicitud Para Un Lugar En La Boleta - 2025](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20for%20Deadline%20for%20Place%20on%20the%20Ballot%20%20%20%202025.pdf?t=202412051741060) [NOTICE OF DRAWING FOR A PLACE ON BALLOT](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250214083314.pdf?t=202502142136350) [AVISO DEL SORTEO PARA UN LUGAR EN LA BOLETA](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250214083314.pdf?t=202502142136350)** [Important Election Dates 2025](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/voter/important-election-dates.shtml#2025) [Fechas Importantes de las Elecciones](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/voter/important-election-dates.shtml#2025) [ORDER OF GENERAL ELECTION  - 2025](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election%202025%20%20Final.pdf?t=202502281300060) [ORDEN DE ELECCION GENERAL - 2025](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election%202025%20%20Final.pdf?t=202502281300060) [NOTICE OF GENERAL ELECTION - 2025](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election%202025%20Final%202.pdf?t=202503041634010) [AVISO DE ELECCION GENERAL - 2025](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election%202025%20Final%202.pdf?t=202503041634010) **CANDIDATES FOR THE 2025 GENERAL ELECTION  TO BE HELD ON MAY 3RD, 2025  AT THE COLORADO CITY CIVIC CENTER LOCATED AT 157 W. 2ND ST., COLORADO CITY, TX MAYOR AT LARGE CANDIATES** Ruben Hurt Jason Havens Rainne Munoz **DISTRICT 1 - COUNCIL MEMBER** Santos Contreras - Unopposed **DISTRICT 2 - COUNCIL MEMBER** James Farquhar - Unopposed **DISCTRICT 5 - COUNCIL MEMBER** Sean P. Schroeder Sarah Ann Cox-Kuss [EARLY VOTING ROSTER - 4-22-25 (LISTA DE VOTACIÓN ANTICIPADA)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/4-22-2025.pdf?t=202504241402210) [EARLY VOTING ROSTER - 4-23-25 (LISTA DE VOTACION ANTICIPADA)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/4-23-2025.pdf?t=202504241403150) [EARLY VOTING ROSTER - 4-24-25 (LISTA DE VOTACIÓN ANTICIPADA)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250424035717.pdf?t=202504250934030) [EARLY VOTING ROSTER - 4-25-25 (LISTA DE VOTACIÓN ANTICIPADA)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250425195132.pdf?t=202504260956480) [EARLY VOTING ROSTER - 4-28-25 (LISTA DE VOTACIÓN ANTICIPADA)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250428190315.pdf?t=202504290906020) [EARLY VOTING ROSTER - 4-29-25 (LISTA DE VOTACIÓN ANTICIPADA)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Early%20Voting%204-29-25.pdf?t=202504301032450) [RECEIVED EARLY VOTING BY MAIL BALLOTS (RECIBI BOLETAS DE VOTACION ANTICIPADA POR CORREO)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250501031942.pdf?t=202505011812180) [ELECTION DAY ROSTER - 5-3-25( LISTA DE ELECCIONES - 5-3-25)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/20250504235509.pdf?t=202505051437400)

This voter information is provided per the Texas Election Code. Voter information is not to be misused. The Texas Election Code also includes the following, regarding voter lists:

Sec. 18.009.  UNLAWFUL USE OF INFORMATION ON REGISTRATION LIST.  (a)  A person commits an offense if the person uses information in connection with advertising or promoting commercial products or services that the person knows was obtained under Section 18.008.(b)  An offense under this section is a Class A misdemeanor.

### **\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\* Election Information** **Información Electoral** **Election Day - May 4, 2024** **Día de elección 4, de mayo, 2024**

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2024, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. **[Internet Posting Requirements for Political Subdivisions](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/doc-09_29_23-16_05_10.pdf?t=202309291707000) [Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot - 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Deadline%20to%20file%20for%20place%20on%20ballot%20%20%202024.pdf?t=202312151759400) [Aviso De Fecha Limite Para Presentar Una Solicitud Para Un Lugar En La Boleta - 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Deadline%20to%20file%20for%20place%20on%20ballot%20%20%202024.pdf?t=202312151759400) [Order of Election - May 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011632410) [Orden De Eleccion Para Municipios](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011632410) [Notice of Election - May 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011633260) [Aviso De Eleccion General](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011633260) [Order of Cancellation - May 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Cancellation%20-%202024.pdf?t=202403201834230) [Ejemplo De Orden De Cancelacion - Mayo 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Cancellation%20-%202024.pdf?t=202403201834230)**

**\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*   Election Information** **Información Electoral** **Election Day - May 6, 2023** **Día de elección  de mayo, 2023**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2023, the Council seats for Mayor , District 1, District 2, and District 5 will be on the ballot. **[Internet Posting Requirements for Political Subdivisions](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Internet%20Posting%20Requirements%20_220503094700.pdf?t=202205031055530) [Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20for%20Deadline%20Place%20on%20the%20Ballot%20-%202023.pdf?t=202212121905090)** **[Notice of Drawing for Place on the Ballot  -  2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/doc-02_20_23-14_53_04.pdf?t=202302201556520) [Order of Election - May 6, 2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011632410) [Notice Of General Election - May 6, 2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011633260) [Order of Cancellation - 2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Cancellation.pdf?t=202303241942360)**

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2022, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. **Additional Resources / Recursos adicionales** [Register to Vote](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/voter/reqvr.shtml) [Voter District Map](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/REDISTRICTING%20MAP.pdf?t=202508151312390) [City Council Agendas & Minutes](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/government/mayor___city_council/agendas___minutes.php) **Early Voting Location / Lugar de Votación Anticipada** **Colorado City Civic Center** 180 W. 3rd St., Colorado City, TX   **Election Day - Voter Locations / Día de las Elecciones - Lugares de Votación** **Colorado City Civic Center** 157 W. 2nd St., Colorado City, TX  **Election Results / Resultados de las elecciones City Hall** 180 W. 3rd St., Colorado City, TX

### **[Internet Posting Requirements for Political Subdivisions (Requisitos de Publicación en Internet Para Subdivisiones Políticas)](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Internet%20Notice%20for%20May%203,%202025%20General%20Election.pdf?t=202404251748050)**
